meaningMnemonic: You've hopefully seen the word 楽しい, which means "fun." This is basically the verb version (ends in an う sound, right?) of that. That means this is <vocabulary>to enjoy something</vocabulary>, or just <vocabulary>to have fun</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the same as the word 楽しい, so be sure to know that word and you'll be able to apply it over here.
